DOC.brief_summary: This is a study to determine the effect of four different dosing regimens of CLP in normal healthy volunteers.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Four Different Dosing Regimens of Cross-Linked Polyelectrolyte (CLP) in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer is â‰¥ 18 years of age with BMI of 1832 Females could not be pregnant or breast feeding and had to be using birth control Must have regular bowel habits, typically producing at least 1 daily bowel movement Screening 12lead ECG demonstrating QTc interval >430 msec for males and >450 msec for females, or any cardiac rhythm disorder considered by the Investigator to be clinically relevant History or presence of gastrointestinal conditions Positive drug screen for substances of abuse Positive results for HIV, hepatitis B, or hepatitis C
